metadata.name: Meta-Being
metadata.description:
There are four stages in life. Birth, perception, becoming a meta and death. These phases are inevitable. We open our eyes to the world and try to understand it. We observe and sometimes ask questions. Then we try to decide what kind of meta we will become with our so-called free will. No matter how, we will become a meta. All humanity is a meta. All human beings are Meta-Being.

Duration: 05.10 min


Creator: Yiğit Erkol

Model: Asrın Bianchi

Original Score: Yağız Oral

Project Manager: Yaren Gülce Yıldız

Poster Design: Burçak Tanrıverdi & Yaprak Kaynar

Assistants: Begüm Erel & Özgür Özder

Make-Up: Kseniya Aydoğan

Studio: No:14 Studio
